introduction: As an experienced developer, author, and trainer in mobility and web technologies, I’ve been an active participant in developer communities since my time as a Microsoft Student Partner.

cards.title: Your .NET Consultant
paragraphs: Specializing in .NET and Azure technologies, I provide expert consulting services to businesses looking to leverage these powerful platforms.

cards.title: Your trainer
paragraphs: Experienced trainer in .NET and Azure technologies for training centers and universities, helping developers enhance their skills.
Content creator for LinkedIn Learning platform.

cards.title: My passion
paragraphs: I’m passionate about development and training, and I’ve consistently met customer needs by using the latest technologies.

cards.title: My experiences
paragraphs: ...with start-ups, SMEs, and digital service companies (ESN / IT) have reinforced my technology choices, particularly those focused on the future.

cards.title: Recent projects
paragraphs: At TRIGO, I enhanced logistics software systems using advanced .NET development, Vue, and Azure.
At Active Assurances, I led a team to improve internal processes and develop internal tools.
These experiences honed my leadership skills and deepened my technical expertise.

cards.title: Personal attributes
paragraphs: Curious, versatile, and quick to get excited about new ideas and projects. I value knowledge and have a knack for understanding and explaining complex concepts easily.
Comfortable in positions where my analytical and design skills are highlighted. While calmer than other extroverted types, I still require a minimum level of social interaction to maintain my energy.
